# Acknowledgements {.unnumbered}

Volume II builds upon the collaborative foundation established in Volume I, with additional contributions from researchers and practitioners specializing in distributed systems, production ML, and responsible AI.

The topics covered in this volume, from distributed training to sustainable AI, reflect the collective expertise of the global ML systems community. We are particularly grateful to contributors who have shared insights from deploying ML systems at scale in both industry and research settings.

## Funding and Support

We gratefully acknowledge continued support from Harvard Data Science Initiative, Harvard Extension School, the National Science Foundation, Edge AI Foundation, ICTP, and our industry partners.

## Contributors

We express our sincere gratitude to all contributors who have helped shape this volume. The challenges of distributed ML systems and production deployment require diverse perspectives, and every contribution has enhanced the quality and relevance of this material.

For the complete and most up to date list of all contributors, please visit the online version at [mlsysbook.ai](https://mlsysbook.ai/contents/frontmatter/acknowledgements/acknowledgements.html). For those interested in contributing, please consult our [GitHub repository](https://github.com/harvard-edge/cs249r_book).
